summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no information available about Courtney Evans. The documents primarily concern the FBI's response to requests from the U.S. Senate Select Committee on Intelligence Activities (SSC) for materials related to Martin Luther King, Jr., and the Southern Christian Leadership Conference (SCLC), as well as investigations into intelligence activities and FBI interactions with the CIA. One document mentions Chicago mobster Sam Giancana's plans. However, none of the summaries mention Courtney Evans or provide any context regarding their identity, role, or involvement in any of the events described.
